member.name: T:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format
member.summary: Applies character and paragraph formatting to text in a RichTextBox.

member.name: T:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.LineSpacing
member.summary: Provides a simple interface to apply appropriate paragraph line spacing to the selected text.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.LineSpacing.Single
member.summary: Single-spaced line spacing between lines of text.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.LineSpacing.OneAndHalf
member.summary: One and one half spaced line spacing between lines of text.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.LineSpacing.Double
member.summary: Double-spaced line spacing between lines of text.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of Format Class, for formatting text in a RichTextBox.
member.param: The handle to the RichTextbox to edit.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SelectionFontName
member.summary: Sets the selected text font face to the specified font name.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SelectionFontSize
member.summary: Sets the selected text font size to the specified size.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SetSelectionFontStyle(System.Drawing.FontStyle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds (or removes) the specified font style to the selected text.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SetSelectionLineSpacing(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets vertical line spacing between lines of text, for the current text selection.
member.param: Set to one of the bLineSpacingRule (BL_) constants, such as "BL_SINGLE_LINE_SPACING".

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.GetSelectionLineSpacing
member.summary: Gets the existing vertical line spacing between lines of text, for the current text selection.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SelectionRightIndentTwips
member.summary: Gets or sets the right indent value of the selected text, in twips.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.SetSelectionRightIndent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the right indent value. Right indent is the distance to indent to the left, from the right margin. The larger the number, the further to the left the text will be indented.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.Format.GetSelectionRightIndent
member.summary: Returns the rtf formatting right indent value for the selected text, in twips.
member.returns: The right indent value in twips.

member.name: T:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText
member.Summary:
Adapted from Martin Muller's article: "Getting WYSIWYG Print Results from a .NET RichTextBox", MSDN, January 2003. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms996492.aspx
Print interfaces (PageSetup, PrintPreview, PrintDialog) have been added.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.#ctor(TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.RichTextBoxCustom@,System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings)
member.summary: Prints either the selected rich text, or all the text from a RichTextBox.
member.param: ref The RichTextbox to print from.
A Printing PageSettings object, or null. If null is used, then the rich text will be printed using the default page settings. (Portrait, 8.5 x 11, 1 in. margins).

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.PageSetupDlg
member.summary: Displays a PageSetupDialog to the user.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.PrintPreviewDlg
member.summary: Displays a PrintPreview dialog to the user.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.HundredthInchToTwips(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert between 1/100 inch (unit used by the .NET framework) and twips (1/1440 inch, used by Win32 API calls)

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.FormatRangeDone
member.summary: Free cached data from rich edit control after printing.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.PrintRichText.FormatRangeText(System.Boolean,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate or render the contents of our RichTextBox for printing.
member.param: If true, only the calculation is performed, otherwise the text is rendered as well
The PrintPageEventArgs object from the PrintPage event
Index of first character to be printed
Index of last character to be printed
member.returns: (Index of last character that fitted on the page) + 1

member.name: E:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.RichTextBoxCustom.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the zoom factor changes.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.TwipsConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes TwipsConverter class that performs conversions between pixels and twips.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.TwipsConverter.ConvertHTwipsToPixels(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts Horizontal twips to pixels.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.TwipsConverter.ConvertPixelsToHTwips(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts pixels to horizontal twips.
member.param: the pixel value to convert to horizontal twips.
member.returns: Returns the horizontal twips value in decimals.

member.name: M:TummoRichTextBox.WordEditor.TwipsConverter.twipsToPixels(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts Twips to Pixels based on Windows graphic display.
member.param: The twips to convert to pixels.
Zero for horizontal, any other number for vertical.
member.returns: Returns the pixel value in decimals.

member.name: T:TummoRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TummoRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
